mdRecord.dcterms:title: Preliminary chart of Hampton Roads and Elizabeth River Virginia: from a trigonometrical survey / under the direction of A.D. Bache, Superintendent of the Survey of the Coast of the United States ; triangulation by E. Blunt, Asst. U.S.C.S. ; topography by John Seib, Asst. ; Hydrography by the party under the command of John J. Almy, Lieut. Comdg. U. S. N. Asst. ; Verified M. L. Smith Capt. Topl. Engrs. Asst. in charge of Office
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Almy, John Jay, 1815-1895
Bache, A. D. (Alexander Dallas), 1806-1867

Graham, C. B. (Curtis B.)
Schoepf, A. S.

United States Coast Survey.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 54 x 39 cm. on sheet 61 x 48 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Redd. Drng. by A. Schopf. C.B. Graham, lithr, Washington.
Text includes information on tides and a table of abbreviations.
"In U.S. Coast Survey. Report. 1857. No. 23. C." -- Swem.
